dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,q.OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,q.OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,q.OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_EU_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,q.OD_SC_MX_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_MX_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,q.OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,q.OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,q.OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,q.OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,q.OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,q.OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_STATUS_NOTIFY ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v q WHERE 1=1 AND ('ODUS' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY='Y' UNION SELECT q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,q.OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,q.OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,q.OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_EU_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,q.OD_SC_MX_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_MX_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,q.OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,q.OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,q.OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,q.OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,q.OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,q.OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_STATUS_NOTIFY ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_sc_eu_vendor_master_v q WHERE 1=1 AND ('ODEU' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY='Y' UNION SELECT q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,q.OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,q.OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,q.OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_EU_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,q.OD_SC_MX_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_MX_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,q.OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,q.OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,q.OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,q.OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,q.OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,q.OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_STATUS_NOTIFY ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_sc_mx_vendor_master_v q WHERE 1=1 AND ('ODMX' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY='Y' UNION SELECT q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,q.OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,q.OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,q.OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,q.OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,q.OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,q.OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_EU_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,q.OD_SC_MX_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_MX_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,q.OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_FACTORY_NO ,q.OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,q.OD_SC_ASIA_CONTACT ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,q.OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,q.OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,q.OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,q.OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,q.OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,q.OD_SC_AUDIT_STATUS_NOTIFY ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,q.OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_sc_asia_vendor_master_v q WHERE 1=1 AND ('ODASIA' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND q.OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY='Y' ORDER BY 14,2,31,12,24,18
